body_html:
I couldn't agree more.

This is why I build my own Debian/Ubuntu packages against distribution provided CUDA framework.

I don't see installing latest bleeding edge CUDA toolkit by hands on production servers as a good practise...

I couldn't agree more.

This is why I build my own Debian/Ubuntu packages against distribution provided CUDA framework.

I don't see installing latest bleeding edge CUDA toolkit by hands on production servers as a good practise...
